steps.name: Stage 0: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup1 - Get HSM Nodes
Stage 2: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup3 - Set HSM Node 0 to Off
Stage 3: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup4 - Set HSM Node 1 to Off
Stage 4: capmcAPISetPowerCap - test1 - POST set_power_cap for powered off node - failure test
Stage 5: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup5 - Set HSM Node 0 to Ready
Stage 6: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup6 - Set HSM Node 1 to Ready
Stage 7: capmcAPISetPowerCap - test2 - set_power_cap for two ready nodes
Stage 8: capmcAPIGetPowerCap - test3 - POST get_power_cap verify power cap values
Stage 9: capmcAPISetPowerCap - test4 - POST set_power_cap value larger than max - failure test
Stage 10: capmcAPISetPowerCap - test5 - POST set_power_cap value less than min - failure test
Stage 11: capmcAPISetPowerCap - test6 - POST set_power_cap to zero
Stage 12: capmcAPISetPowerCap - test7 - POST set_power_cap to zero second time - failure test
Stage 13: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup7 - Set HSM Node 0 to Off
Stage 14: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup8 - Set HSM Node 0 to its original state
Stage 15: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup9 - Set HSM Node 1 to Off
Stage 16: capmcAPISetPowerCap - setup10 - Set HSM Node 1 to its original state
